html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01592024-02-21GAC
ActSpecial Economic Measures Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Special Economic Measures (Russia) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add ten (10) individuals and one hundred fifty-three (153) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations; (2) add explosives, including detonator devices and charges used in mining and construction industries to Schedule 7 of the Regulations; and (3) remove the definition of " designated person" to align with the authority in the Act to list any persons outside of Canada who are not Canadian.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0032 Publication Date: 2024-03-13
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the SPECIAL ECONOMIC MEASURES (RUSSIA) REGULATIONS in order to (1) add ten (10) individuals and one hundred fifty-three (153) entities to Schedule 1 of the Regulations; (2) add explosives, including detonator devices and charges used in mining and construction industries to Schedule 7 of the Regulations; and (3) remove the definition of " designated person" to align with the authority in the Act to list any persons outside of Canada who are not Canadian.
